name: Sebastian Lukasz Nowak
profile_summary:
As a skilled Senior Quality Engineer with 8 years of experience, I have a strong command of **test automation** and **software testing** techniques, ensuring high-quality deliverables in automotive and healthcare applications. My technical proficiency includes **Python**, **Shell scripting**, and **Linux**, coupled with hands-on experience in using **Git** for version control. I am adept at utilizing **Pytest** and **Appium** for comprehensive testing strategies, including HIL testing and performance assessments.

My background in full stack development enables me to work effectively with technologies such as **React**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**, providing a unique perspective on application performance and robustness. I have successfully integrated testing frameworks in CI/CD pipelines to enhance product quality and deliverability. I possess a detail-oriented mindset and problem-solving skills that empower me to tackle complex testing scenarios independently while adhering to industry compliance standards. My experience using **QNX** for automotive applications further ensures that I bring a well-rounded approach to quality assurance.

experience.responsibilities:
- Implemented test automation strategies using **Appium** and **Pytest** to enhance software testing efficiency for both mobile applications on **Android** and web platforms.
- Developed comprehensive software testing protocols for healthcare and financial applications, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards and high-quality deliverables.
- Leveraged **Git** for version control in collaborative development environments, maintaining robust code management practices.
- Performed rigorous HIL testing and validation on automotive systems utilizing **QNX**, ensuring system reliability and safety during deployment.
- Executed Shell scripting tasks within **Linux** environments to optimize testing workflows and system performance.
- Utilized problem-solving skills to identify and rectify software bugs, resulting in a **30% reduction** in critical issues during production.
- Conducted independence in managing testing phases, from documentation to execution, ensuring smooth project deliveries under tight deadlines.
- Designed and implemented testing frameworks that support regression and integration testing across multi-technology stacks and services.
- Collaborated closely with software engineers and data scientists to drive quality improvements in machine learning and data-driven services.
- Delivered detailed test reports and metrics tracking, improving project accountability and quality assurance processes by **25%**.

Implemented **test automation** frameworks using **Python** and **Pytest** to ensure software quality and reliability in automotive applications, enhancing testing efficiency by **30%**.
Executed **software testing** strategies for embedded systems, including **Android** and **QNX** platforms, improving bug detection rates by **25%**.
Utilized **Shell scripting** for automating testing processes and report generation in a **Linux** environment, leading to a **40%** reduction in manual testing efforts.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to establish best practices for **Git** version control, ensuring a streamlined code review process and enhancing team productivity.
Conducted **HIL testing** for automotive systems over **CAN** and **Ethernet** protocols, successfully identifying critical system failures prior to deployment.
Developed mobile application testing strategies using **Appium** for **Android** platforms, increasing test coverage and user satisfaction metrics.
Demonstrated exceptional **problem-solving** skills while diagnosing and troubleshooting complex technical issues in real-time, often requiring independent research and innovative solutions.
Produced comprehensive documentation for testing procedures and automated scripts, contributing to knowledge sharing within the team.

Utilized **Python** and **Shell scripting** to develop and maintain test automation scripts, ensuring high standards of **software testing** across a variety of automotive applications, with a focus on **Android** and **QNX** environments.
Implemented comprehensive test strategies using **Pytest** and **Appium**, successfully reducing testing time by **30%** and increasing defect detection rates by **20%** during cycles.
Managed version control and collaborative code development through **Git**, fostering a seamless workflow within the testing team and promoting code reviews and best practices.
Conducted Hardware-in-the-Loop (**HIL**) testing setups and executed tests for **CAN** and **Ethernet** communication protocols, leading to robust product validations in real-world scenarios.
Employed **Linux** tools for efficient test environment setup and execution, enhancing test reliability and repeatability across **9+** devices.
Demonstrated strong problem-solving skills by troubleshooting and resolving intricate testing issues independently, streamlining the testing processes to better meet project timelines.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, bringing independence and initiative to identify testing requirements and communicate critical feedback to improve software quality and performance.
